title: Form in the making (TEFC)
creator_credit: Stockwell College of Education, Donald Douglas and Julian Bates
brief_description: Follows the work of sculptor Alan Bransbury as he creates a sculpture of the madonna and child. Sequences of the conception, modeling, casting, delivery, and mounting of the sculpture help clarify the techniques and creative problems involved in producing a major work of sculpture.
